ModMetaData.name: Extended traits
ModMetaData.author: Caminha
ModMetaData.description:
Adds 14 new traits!
> Swiftfoot > Steady-footed > Bad reflexes > Good reflexes > Toxicity intolerant > Toxicity sensitive > Toxicity resistance > Glutton > Nibbler > Healthy > Frail constitution > Social butterfly > Silver-tongued > Perfectionist
